attributes.action: Fine Airlines with Poor Customer Support
attributes.additional_details:
The impunity with which Easyjet has dismissed our complaints and repeatedly lied was something we could never have imagined possible in this day and age.
We also found the inaction of the regulator, the Civil Aviation Authority,  even more shocking, and most likely to be very reason why this airline feels it can treat its customers in this way.
Please sign this petition to bring this to the attention of parliament.
attributes.background:
Easyjet's Customer Service appears to repeatedly mislead / ignore / dither / fail to reply to customers with valid grievances, with complete impunity due to inaction from the Civil Aviation Service.
Please sign this petition to bring this to the attention of parliament.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. The UK Government and Parliament does not have the power to fine individual companies. You could start a petition calling on the Government to introduce a customer service regulator with the power to fine companies.
